title: VR Interactive Experiences
description: Virtual Reality (VR) is transforming how we experience digital environments by creating immersive, interactive spaces. I have developed multiple VR projects that enhance user engagement through realistic environments and interactive elements. These projects include a virtual showroom for shoes and a heritage walk experience, demonstrating expertise in 3D modeling, environment design, and real-time rendering.
features: Developed a **VR Shoes Showroom**, allowing users to explore and interact with realistic 3D models of shoes in a fully immersive virtual space.
Created **A Heritage Walk VR Experience**, enabling users to navigate through a 3D-rendered historical environment, providing an interactive and educational tour.
Integrated real-time interactions, allowing users to inspect objects, change views, and experience the space as if physically present.
Optimized performance for seamless rendering, ensuring a smooth experience across VR headsets and web-based VR platforms.
technologies: WebXR API for immersive web-based VR experiences
useCases: E-commerce enhancement through immersive product displays
